>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/scalartax/s_l_nexuses/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint allows the user to update the nexus information for a specific tenant.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"nexuses":{"type":"array","description":"List of nexus records","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"entity_id":{"type":"string","description":"The unique ID of the entity","required":true},"country":{"type":"string","description":"The country code (e.g., \"US\")","required":true},"region":{"type":"string","description":"The region or state code (e.g., \"CA\")","required":true},"juris_type_id":{"type":"integer","description":"The jurisdiction type ID","required":true},"jurisdiction_type_id":{"type":"integer","description":"The jurisdiction type ID","required":true},"juris_code":{"type":"string","description":"The jurisdiction code (e.g., \"CA123\")","required":true},"juris_name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the jurisdiction (e.g., \"California\")","required":true},"effective_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"The effective date of the nexus","required":true},"end_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","nullable":true,"description":"The end date of the nexus, if applicable","required":false},"short_name":{"type":"string","description":"The short name for the jurisdiction (e.g., \"CA\")","required":true},"signature_code":{"type":"string","description":"Signature code related to the nexus","required":false},"state_assigned_no":{"type":"string","description":"State-assigned \"destination\"","required":true},"has_local_nexus":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether there is local nexus","required":false},"local_nexus_type_id":{"type":"integer","description":"The local nexus type ID","required":false},"has_permanent_establishment":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether there is a permanent establishment","required":false},"tax_id":{"type":"string","description":"The tax ID associated with the nexus","required":false},"streamlined_sales_tax":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the nexus is part of the Streamlined Sales Tax program","required":false},"is_sst_active":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the Streamlined Sales Tax is active","required":false},"created_by_id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID of the user who created the nexus","required":true},"updated_by_id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID of the user who last updated the nexus","required":true},"tax_type_group":{"type":"string","description":"Group of tax types applicable to the nexus (e.g., \"Sales\")","required":false},"nexus_tax_type_group":{"type":"string","description":"The nexus tax type group (e.g., \"Retail\")","required":false},"is_seller_importer_of_record":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the seller is the importer of record for tax purposes","required":false},"tax_name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the tax (e.g., \"Sales Tax\")","required":true},"taxable_nexus":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the nexus is taxable","required":true}},"required":["entity_id","country","region","juris_type_id","juridiction_type_id","juris_code","juris_name","effective_date","short_name","nexus_type_id","sourcing","created_by_id","updated_by_id","tax_name","taxable_nexus"]}}},"required":"nexuses","title":"S_l_Nexus"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
